name: Get to Porty
description:
➡ Play it in Core ⬅

Created as part of the game jam @ https://itch.io/jam/kindafunny

Description:

It was a normal Wednesday. The Kinda Funny crew just wrapped on a live episode of KFAF on twitch.tv/kindafunny, the show where Nick and Andy, "@$#& around a lot, and then it ends" (Nick Scarpino, 2019). They then leave the set to go edit videos and drink iced coffees, except something's different this time...

Someone left their cup of Diet Choke on the set's coffee table, and due to over-carbonation in the soda dispenser it was filled with, the cup is primed to burst. What's wrong with a little spilled Diet Choke, though, right?

WRONG. Portillo, Greg of Kinda Funny's weiner dog, was sleeping nearby; now awakened by a burst of a Diet Choke cup on set, and drawn closer by the tantalizing smell of non-sugar-based-sweetener wafting into the air.

You, a group of tiny players dropped on the scene, must escape the Diet Choke spill and get to Porty so he doesn't drink unhealthy soda!

In other words: Race to the finish to get to Porty and flee to safety!
